forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air is crisp and refreshing, with the remnants of night still clinging to the edges of the city. A gentle north breeze whispers through the streets, offering a hint of warmth despite the coolness lingering in the shadows. The forecast promises a sunlit embrace as the day unfolds, with temperatures gradually rising to a comfortable almost 60 degrees. As you gaze upon the skyline, clarity dominates the horizon, free from the usual dense shrouds of fog that can so frequently blanket this city. The Golden Gate, a remarkable silhouette against the slightly hazy backdrop, stands as a testimony to the beauty that the clearer skies will reveal as the morning continues.

With temperatures expected to dip slightly in the afternoon, dressing in layers is wise—think a light sweater or a jacket that can be shed as the sun reaches its zenith. This is a day born for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to one of the many inviting cafés nestled in the heart of the city. The brightness of the sky invites moments of reflection, offering locals and visitors alike the perfect backdrop for a casual gathering or an intimate conversation over coffee. As the sun climbs higher, the city will greet you with open arms, urging every explorer to relish its charm and embrace the day ahead.
